root.name: Luxor: Amun Rising
root.description: GameplayTraditional gameplay with 86 levels of marble blasting puzzles, this time with a pyramid theme.This game features a new power called Scorpion.System RequirementsMinimum:OS:Windows Vista, XP, 7Processor:800 MHzMemory:128 MB RAMDirectXÂ®:9.0Hard Drive:512 MB HD space
